akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability of laws and regulations to acquired lands and interests therein

akn:content.akn:p: § 430a–3. Applicability of laws and regulations to acquired lands and interests therein Lands and interests therein acquired pursuant to sections 430a–1 to 430a–3 of this title shall thereupon become a part of the Kings Mountain National Military Park and be subject to all the laws and regulations applicable thereto. (Pub. L. 86–62, § 3, June 23, 1959, 73 Stat. 108.)
